text: Kadaikutty Singam (Youngest lion) is a 2018 Indian Tamil language movie. Pandiraj wrote and directed the movie. Suriya produced the movie for his studio 2D Entertainment. The movie stars Karthi and Sayyeshaa. The movie was also released in Telugu as Chinna Babu. The movie was released on 13 July 2018. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:Tamil-language movies Category:2018 drama movies Category:2018 action movies Category:2010s Indian movies
title: Kadaikutty Singam
